title: Did the U.S. Government Warn About Bananas Contaminated with Zika?
subtitle: A junk news website produced yet another scaremongering story intended to provoke well-intentioned sharing on social media.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In 2017, 2018 or 2019, the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention warned the public about a shipment of Zika-contaminated bananas.
